title: TEAM LF SUPP MAIN
body:
Ranked 5's Team LF a Support Main to Join us.

We are all mid 20's so similar age would be prefd.

All players ranked mid/high silver/gold last season

Hit me up in game

Kaizzaarr

replies.body: Hey I would like to join your team :) got to s2 last season, I'll add you tonight.
